Description.val: Communications Data Link System Technical Refresh (CDLS TR)]: Provides fielding link management computer upgrades to meet Fleet Windows 10 Operating System IA requirements, a second 360 degree data link, as well as the inclusion of digital distribution of Intelligence Surveillance and Reconnaissance (ISR), Full Motion Video (FMV), and Anti-Submarine Warfare (ASW) data in  Plain Text (PT) to Automated Digital Network System (ADNS) for shipboard dissemination to support Anti-Access/Area Denial (A2AD). CDLS TR supports various Common Data Link (CDL) air platforms including MH-60R, MQ-4 Triton, MQ-8B/C Fire Scout, P-3 and P-8  to include command and control of the aircraft during flight operations. The CDLS TR upgrade includes a Flight Deck Checkout test link between aircraft on the deck through CDLS to end-user prior to flight operations to ensure end-to-end connectivity of organic assets prior to missions.

Justification.val: FY21 funding supports procurement of two(2) Communications Data Link System (CDLS) Technical Refresh (TR) systems on CVN platforms. Due to increased fleet Common Data Link (CDL) operations, CDLS Legacy obsolescence issues, a CDLS Tech Refresh is required to extend the life of the system beyond its intended design. CDLS TR addresses whole system reliability, sub-component obsolescence, and emerging Anti-Access/Area Denial (A2AD) Fleet requirements that are significantly degrading Fleet readiness, including Operational Availability (Ao), and system supportability. CDLS TR also provides IA/Cyber security upgrades to Windows 10 OS.

Name.@footnote: FY21 procurement cost increased to address critical capability gaps on two (2) CVNs.

ImplementationMethodName.val: [none specified]:: Installation Name: CDLS TR Procurement
